title: [Large-Scale] Breaking Hospital Organizational Boundaries and Expanding Learning: Collaborative Tool Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge of organizational assessment and learning theories, intermediate understanding of hospital workflows
context.additional_context: Learners, as ordinary citizens, explore applying expansive learning theory through case studies on breaking down hospital organizational boundaries and improving evaluation systems. Includes collaborative boundary object creation using digital tools in a blended environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative tool development processes to break down boundaries between evaluation teams and field operation teams within hospital organizations
Learners can analyze organizational change tasks and propose solutions by applying an expansive learning model based on activity theory
Learners can co-create boundary objects using digital collaboration tools and utilize them for organizational learning and improvement

resources: Online Collaboration Platforms (e.g., Miro, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
